Text: Very good audio and video. FYI-For those that may notice, the intro credits are shot in 4:3 format. During the first scene, the video changes to 16:9. Thank you uploader.

Quality is excellent!
A:10
V: 10

However, little warning to PS3 users, it has Cinavia protection so will cut out the audio after 20minutes of playback.

Cinavia protected. Audio will cut on PS3 and some BD players. 

Great looking file, though.
Excellent upload, thanks! BTW vivatpb5776, the 4:3 opening is part of the movie! It's an historic archive sequence.
